name: part_004
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel, Yukihana Lamy, and Oozora Subaru performing 'Edison' on a digital stage.
Shirogane Noel singing a ballad while sitting on a large crescent moon prop.

subtitles.original: サークルでの宴会芸
subtitles.english: Party tricks at the club circle.

subtitles.original: ノリで始めたバンドで
subtitles.english: With a band started on a whim.

subtitles.original: まぐれでバズってメジャーデビュー
subtitles.english: Went viral by a fluke and made a major debut.

subtitles.original: なぜか今自信がないミュージシャン
subtitles.english: Somehow now a musician with no confidence.

subtitles.original: 踊るエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Dancing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: 歌うエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Singing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: 踊るエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Dancing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: 歌うエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Singing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: YouTubeを見て得る1%のひらめきインスピレーション
subtitles.english: The 1% flash of inspiration gained from watching YouTube.

subtitles.original: SNS通して繋がる発明家のコミュニケーション
subtitles.english: Inventor's communication connecting through SNS.

subtitles.original: インスタ映え狙った投稿 webニュースで情報収集
subtitles.english: Posts aiming to be Insta-worthy, gathering info via web news.

subtitles.original: 間違いなくこれからの時代来るのは活動写真
subtitles.english: Undoubtedly what's coming in the future is motion pictures.

subtitles.original: いやー絶対来ると思うんだけどなー
subtitles.english: Man, I definitely think it's coming though.

subtitles.original: 踊る暇があったら発明して
subtitles.english: If you have time to dance, invent something.

subtitles.original: 歌う暇があったら発明して
subtitles.english: If you have time to sing, invent something.

subtitles.original: ライブのブッキング蹴って発明して
subtitles.english: Kick the live booking and invent something.

subtitles.original: そんな発明王にオレはなる
subtitles.english: I'm gonna become that kind of King of Invention.

subtitles.original: 踊るエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Dancing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: 歌うエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Singing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: 踊るエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Dancing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: 歌うエジソン 自尊心
subtitles.english: Singing Edison, self-esteem.

subtitles.original: 今日はこのままさよならじゃないよ
subtitles.english: Today isn't goodbye just like this.

subtitles.original: 手をとってくれたなら
subtitles.english: If you take my hand...

subtitles.original: 秘密も眠りにつくような夜に
subtitles.english: On a night where even secrets fall asleep,

subtitles.original: 君を連れていくよ
subtitles.english: I'll take you with me.

subtitles.original: それは例えば遠く離れていたって
subtitles.english: Even if, for example, we were far apart,

subtitles.original: 手を繋いでられるような
subtitles.english: Like being able to hold hands.

subtitles.original: 奇跡のような
subtitles.english: Like a miracle.

subtitles.original: 話をしよう
subtitles.english: Let's talk.

subtitles.original: 窓は開けておいて
subtitles.english: Keep the window open.

subtitles.original: 今日までを思い出して
subtitles.english: Remembering everything up to today.

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ並べたら
subtitles.english: If we line them up one by one,

subtitles.original: 明日の雨が気になりだして
subtitles.english: Starting to worry about tomorrow's rain.

subtitles.original: どうも眠れないみたいだ
subtitles.english: Seem unable to sleep somehow.

subtitles.original: 変わりたくないことや
subtitles.english: Things I don't want to change,

subtitles.original: 変わらなきゃいけないことも
subtitles.english: And things I have to change.

subtitles.original: 少し忘れたまま
subtitles.english: While forgetting them a little,

subtitles.original: 窓の外を眺めていたんだ
subtitles.english: I was gazing out the window.

subtitles.original: ああ雨が降り出すその前に
subtitles.english: Ah, before the rain starts falling,

subtitles.original: 君のところまで行けるような気がして
subtitles.english: I feel like I can make it to where you are.

subtitles.original: 目を閉じた
subtitles.english: I closed my eyes.

subtitles.original: そしてこのまま遠へと行こう
subtitles.english: And let's go far away just like this.

subtitles.original: 手をとってくれるかな
subtitles.english: Will you take my hand?

subtitles.original: 秘密も眠りにつくような夜を
subtitles.english: A night where even secrets fall asleep,

subtitles.original: 君と泳いでくよ
subtitles.english: I'll swim through it with you.

subtitles.original: 街の明かりが消える度に笑って
subtitles.english: Laughing every time the city lights go out.

subtitles.original: 路地裏で抱き合おう
subtitles.english: Let's embrace in the back alley.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿みたいな
subtitles.english: Like idiots.

subtitles.original: 話をしよう
subtitles.english: Let's talk.

subtitles.original: 窓は開けておいて
subtitles.english: Keep the window open.

subtitles.original: 聞こえる？
subtitles.english: Can you hear it?

subtitles.original: 聞こえる
subtitles.english: I can hear it.

subtitles.original: 愛おしいことや無くせないものを
subtitles.english: Precious things and things I can't lose...

subtitles.original: 教えてくれたのは今日みたいな
subtitles.english: What taught me those was a day like today.

subtitles.original: 夜を重ねて織り上げてきた私たちに響く音
subtitles.english: The sound echoing to us who have woven nights together.

subtitles.original: 夜が来るたびに心が踊ってしまうのは
subtitles.english: The reason my heart dances every time night comes is...

subtitles.original: また一つ重なっていくから
subtitles.english: Because they stack up one by one again.
